channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 63, "How Are Sales Today?"
channel.description:
In this episode, we talk about the [new app from Quantic Insights](http://www.quanticinsights.com/), opening up a business bank account, meditation, mellowing out with age, new Userscape office, and Fallout 4.
[Download the episode here.](http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-63-how-are-sales-today/)
Thanks to [Backup Pro](https://mithra62.com/projects/view/backup-pro) for sponsoring this weeks show. Get 50% off with coupon code **bootstrapped.fm**
Also thanks to Linode for sponsoring this weeks show. Get $10 off your first month with code: **bootstrapped10** http://linode.com/bootstrappedfm

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 63, "How Are Sales Today?"
item.dc:creator: kreiderjens
item.description:
Hi,
nice episode. A little question. What programming language did you use for Quantic Insights?

I like your thoughts on saas vs local app. My next side project should be a local app but i can not decide which language i should use.

Read full topic
